thread.title: USA Gymnastics Ends Training for Top Athletes at Texas Ranch

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: USA Gymnastics Ends Training for Top Athletes at Texas Ranch

organizations.name: usa gymnastics ends training for top athletes

text:
America’s top gymnasts will no longer train at the Karolyi Ranch in Texas, USA Gymnastics said Thursday, following calls by U.S. Olympians to abandon the storied facility, where some of the sport’s biggest stars say they were sexually abused by the national team’s former doctor.

The move by the governing body, which has faced mounting criticism for its handling of the scandal, came days after Simone Biles, the five-time Olympic gold-medalist, said Larry Nassar had abused her under the guise of medical treatment, and expressed...
